name: Email Sending System with multi-user functionality
description:
Developed an email application with multi-user functionality using Tkinter and SMTP.
Enabled real-time messaging.

name: Sentiment Analysis Web App
description:
Built a sentiment analysis tool using Naive Bayes Classifier.
Designed frontend with HTML/CSS and developed backend in Python.
Achieved ~85% accuracy on test data.

name: Banking Management System
description:
Created a desktop app using Python Tkinter for managing user accounts and transactions.
Implemented login, deposit, and withdrawal functionalities.
